---
name: Feature Request (Epic)
about: Propose a new feature or epic
title: "Epic: [Short description of the feature]"
labels: epic
assignees:

---

## Feature Request Process

### Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

### Use Case
Explain the use case for this feature. Who will benefit from it?

### Proposed Solution
A brief description of how you think this feature could be implemented (optional).

### Additional Context
Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.
